question: My daughter is 6 1/2 years old and she pees her pants all the time.  I have taken her to the doctor and they repeated do the UTI tests and diabetes screening and still negative.  But my child wets herself constantly.  She claims she didn't realize she wet herself, and other times she just gets up and changes.  When she is at school she will pee in her underwear but it doesn't soak through so she sits in pee all day and never tells anyone.  I have talked with her, her dad has talked to her and so has our school counselor.  Our family has gone through alot of really big changes over the past year since this has been happening but nothing is working.  Please help me I dont know what else to do for my baby???????
title: She Just won't stop peeing on herelf
